title: How to Make Apple Cider Floats

steps.headline: Scoop one scoop of ice cream into two glass mason jars.
Pour one cup of both apple ciders into each of the glasses.
Squirt whipped cream onto the floats.
Stick a cinnamon stick and apple slice into the floats.
Sprinkle an equal amount of cinnamon onto the floats.
Chill the floats.
steps.description: Place the glasses on a tray and place them in the fridge. Allow them to chill for about 15-20 minutes until they are cold.

steps.headline: Remove the glasses from the fridge and serve.

text: Scoop one scoop of ice cream into two glass mason jars.  Pour one cup of both apple ciders into each of the glasses. Stir gently with a spoon. Squirt whipped cream onto the floats.  Stick a cinnamon stick and apple slice into the floats.  Sprinkle an equal amount of cinnamon onto the floats.  Chill the floats. Place the glasses on a tray and place them in the fridge. Allow them to chill for about 15-20 minutes until they are cold. Remove the glasses from the fridge and serve. Enjoy!
